title: Dezerv | Backend Engineer | Bangalore
content:
Education: Btech from Tier 3
Years of Experience: 1
Prior Experience: Bangalore based startup

Date of the Offer: Aug 2024
Company: Dezerv
Title/Level: Backend Engineer
Location: BLR
Salary: Rs. 18L
ESOP: 0
Joining Bonus: Rs 2L
Total comp (Salary + Stock): Rs 20L
Other details: I tried negotiating but they aren't going above 18 fixed even after strong interview feedbacks.
